name: α-dimethyl-3-(4'-hydroxy-3'-methoxyphenyl)propylsilyloxy, ω-3-dimethyl-3-(4'-hydroxy-3'-methoxyphenyl) propylsilyl polydimethylsiloxane
SMLTrestrictions: G33 Group Restriction No. 33 corresponds to FCM substance No. 180,874. Group restriction specification is expressed as eugenol.
Restrictions: Only to be used as comonomer in siloxane modified polycarbonate.The oligomeric mixture shall be characterised by the formula C24H38Si2O5(SiOC2H6)n (50 > n ≥ 26).
Notes: ND The specific migration limit is non-detectable (ND). A detection limit of 0.01mg substance per kg food is applicable unless specified differently for an individual substance.
